name: Swin The Piggy by Rosi Ringel
description:
These compositions of the lighthearted avatar "Swin the piggy" were handcrafted by austrian art therapist Rosi Ringel.
Born end of the 1950's, they are one of the few artists of their generation to partake in the transformation of blockchain art in an intergenerational dialogue.
All funds raised will benefit Mrs. Ringels cancer therapy and palliative end-of-life care.
There is no further roadmap to this project.
Purpose is the art that is on display, which now will forever live on Bitcoin.
